name: Rosaria
title: "Thorny Benevolence" Rosaria
desc: "Light creates shadow, but shadow will not be controlled by light."

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Rosaria to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Ravaging Confession
skills.desc: Deals 1 Cryo DMG, creates 1 stack of Scope Out Soft Spots. (When the Scope Out Soft Spots effect is triggered, creates Strike Where It Hurts.)

skills.name: Rites of Termination
skills.desc: Deals 1 Cryo DMG, creates 2 stacks of Scope Out Soft Spots, and summons Evercold Frostlance.
